attributes.action: Make the teaching of Mental Health part of the Education Curriculum
attributes.additional_details: I would like the Government to back the idea that the teaching of Mental Health should be taught in every school within the UK. Not only to benefit the younger generation but to make the parents more aware that with every passing year, suicide and other knock-on effects that arise from mental health conditions such as depression is escalating at a rapid pace. I would like the Government to pass law that Mental Health should be fully welcomed into the educational curriculum and be a mandatory class for pupils to take.
